page.title: 06A FAMILY IN FREELAND
page.content: Vicky lives in Lush Lane where she has lived all her life. She is ten and she has one older brother. Her mum is a hairdresser and her dad works at Oxford instruments in Eynsham. She has a cat. Her hobbies are ballroom dancing, listening to records and Guides. She is going to Greece for her holidays. At school she likes art and maths best, plays rounders and netball and likes school dinners. Roger is 11 and has a brother aged 14 and a sister aged 16. He has lived in Glasgow Road for 10 years. His hobby is computer and he plays computer games. For pets he has 2 dogs, love birds, diamond doves and fantailed fish. In summer he likes swimming and in winter sledging or messing around with toys if there's no snow. His favourite food is chips.
